title: Fill Blank Task
description: This object represents a fill-in-the-blank exercise where each sentence contains one or more blanks. Each blank must be filled in using one correct word chosen from multiple options. The main field is 'sentences', a list of tasks.

sentence_with_blanks.description: A sentence with one or more missing words represented by underscores (___). Each blank should match a correct answer.

correct_answers.description: An array of correct words that fill in the blanks, in the order they appear in the sentence.

options.description: An array of arrays. Each inner array contains multiple choices for one blank (including the correct answer). Do not create a separate array for each individual option â€” each blank should have exactly one array with at least three choices.
